title: Physicochemical characterization of pectin and mango peel (Mangifera indica L.) from Mexican cultivars
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Andrés A. Pacheco-Jiménez, Jaime Lizardi-Mendoza, J. Basilio Heredia, Erick P. Gutiérrez-Grijalva, Eber A. Quintana-Obregón, María D. Muy-Rangel
